sect3.title: Program Files
sect3.para: a2p, c2ph, dprofpp, find2perl, h2ph, h2xs, perl, perl5.6.1, perlbug, perlcc, perldoc, pl2pm, pod2html, pod2latex, pod2man, pod2text, pod2usage, podchecker, podselect, pstruct, s2p and splain

sect4.title: a2p
sect4.para: a2p is an awk to perl translator.

sect4.title: c2ph
sect4.para: c2ph dumps C structures as generated from "cc -g -S" stabs.

sect4.title: dprofpp
sect4.para: dprofpp displays perl profile data.

sect4.title: find2perl
sect4.para: find2perl translates find command lines to Perl code.

sect4.title: h2ph
sect4.para: h2ph converts .h C header files to .ph Perl header files.

sect4.title: h2xs
sect4.para: h2xs converts .h C header files to Perl extensions.

sect4.title: perl, perl5.6.1
sect4.para: perl is the Practical Extraction and Report Language. It combines some of the best features of C, sed, awk, and sh into one powerful language.

sect4.title: perlbug
sect4.para: perlbug helps to generate bug reports about perl or the modules that come with it, and mail them.

sect4.title: perlcc
sect4.para: perlcc generates executables from Perl programs.

sect4.title: perldoc
sect4.para: perldoc looks up a piece of documentation in .pod format that is embedded in the perl installation tree or in a perl script, and displays it via "pod2man | nroff -man | $PAGER".

sect4.title: pl2pm
sect4.para: pl2pm is a tool to aid in the conversion of Perl4-style .pl library files to Perl5-style library modules.

sect4.title: pod2html
sect4.para: pod2html converts files from pod format to HTML format.

sect4.title: pod2latex
sect4.para: pod2latex converts files from pod format to LaTeX format.

sect4.title: pod2man
sect4.para: pod2man converts pod data to formatted *roff input.

sect4.title: pod2text
sect4.para: pod2text converts pod data to formatted ASCII text.

sect4.title: pod2usage
sect4.para: pos2usage prints usage messages from embedded pod docs in files.

sect4.title: podchecker
sect4.para: podchecker checks the syntax of pod format documentation files.

sect4.title: podselect
sect4.para: podselect prints selected sections of pod documentation on standard output.

sect4.title: pstruct
sect4.para: pstruct dumps C structures as generated from "cc -g -S" stabs.

sect4.title: s2p
sect4.para: s2p is a sed to perl translator.

sect4.title: splain
sect4.para: splain is a program to force verbose warning diagnostics in perl.
